item.description:
Our featured speaker will be Daniela Stark, the inventor and developer of the Kidknows Outdoor Thermometer, which empowers kids to choose the right outdoor clothing even if they are not old enough to recognize numbers. Daniela was an award winning industrial designer for Product Genesis and Arthur D. Little, Inc. She has been an independent consultant for medical and consumer product companies.

Arrive as early as 6:30 to network with others. A map of MIT showing the meeting location is at http://whereis.mit.ed.... Street parking on Ames Street, Vassar Street or Memorial Drive is suggested. Most MIT buildings have easy access and are interconnected.
item.name: Inventors Association of New England September Meetup
